author: Robert W. Service

quote: The success of a production depends on the attention paid to detail.
author: David O. Selznick

quote: Personal relationships are the fertile soil from which all advancement, all success, all achievement in real life grows.
author: Ben Stein

quote: Success is the maximum utilization of the ability that you have.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The first principle of success is desire - knowing what you want. Desire is the planting of your seed.
author: Robert Collier

quote: I don't think 'Cocktail' was a perfect critical success, but it touched a vein in our culture.
author: Elisabeth Shue

quote: I always say be humble but be firm. Humility and openness are the key to success without compromising your beliefs.
author: George Hickenlooper

quote: Anyone who has to fight, even with the most modern weapons, against an enemy in complete command of the air, fights like a savage against modern European troops, under the same handicaps and with the same chances of success.
author: Erwin Rommel

quote: The only true measure of success is the ratio between what we might have done and what we might have been on the one hand, and the thing we have made and the things we have made of ourselves on the other.
author: H. G. Wells

quote: The real success in golf lies in turning three shots into two.
author: Bobby Locke

quote: In the end, you make your reputation and you have your success based upon credibility and being able to provide people who are really hungry for information what they want.
author: Brit Hume

quote: The way a team plays as a whole determines its success.
author: George Herman

quote: Success is what you do with your ability. It's how you use your talent.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: To be ready to fail is to be prepared for success.
author: Jose Bergamin

quote: We can come to look upon the deaths of our enemies with as much regret as we feel for those of our friends, namely, when we miss their existence as witnesses to our success.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Success comes in waves.
author: Guy Pearce

quote: Success for me means being able to work. I don't look at so much at what I've done as much as I look to what I will do.
author: Phylicia Rashad

quote: The one phrase you can use is that success has a thousand fathers, and failure is an orphan.
author: Alan Price

quote: Success is steady progress toward one's personal goals.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: It's a special person - and personality - who can lead a start-up to soaring success and sustain that success for the long term. Apple co-founder Steve Jobs and Facebook's Mark Zuckerberg are star examples.
author: Marcus Buckingham

quote: An artist must never be a prisoner. Prisoner? An artist should never be a prisoner of himself, prisoner of style, prisoner of reputation, prisoner of success, etc.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: The superior man makes the difficulty to be overcome his first interest success only comes later.
author: Confucius

quote: Success cannot come from standstill men. Methods change and men must change with them.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: You really have to work hard and apply yourself and by applying yourself and working hard and being diligent, you can achieve success.
author: Julie Benz

quote: Success - it's what you do with what you've got.
author: Woody Hayes

quote: I wonder how many times people give up just before a breakthrough - when they are on the very brink of success.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: You never achieve success unless you like what you are doing.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: What drives success, and the most successful students, is internal motivation.
author: Vivienne Ming

quote: Success is counted sweetest by those who never succeed.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Success - keeping your mind awake and your desire asleep.
author: Walter Scott

quote: The real secret of success is enthusiasm.
author: Walter Chrysler

quote: Success is a terrible thing and a wonderful thing. If you can enjoy it, it's wonderful. If it starts eating away at you, and they're waiting for more from me, or what can I do to top this, then you're in trouble. Just do what you love. That's all I want to do.
author: Gene Wilder

quote: When one side benefits more than the other, that's a win-lose situation. To the winner it might look like success for a while, but in the long run, it breeds resentment and distrust.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Our limitations and success will be based, most often, on your own expectations for ourselves. What the mind dwells upon, the body acts upon.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: People think your success is just a matter of having a pretty face. But it's easy to be chewed up and spat out. You've got to stay ahead of the game to be able to stay in it.
author: Kate Moss

quote: Success is little more than a chemical compound of man with moment.
author: Philip Guedalla

quote: There is no force like success, and that is why the individual makes all effort to surround himself throughout life with the evidence of it; as of the individual, so should it be of the nation.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: You cannot allow your desire to be a winner to be diminished by achieving success before and I believe there is room for improvement in every sportsman.
author: Lionel Messi

quote: Success depends almost entirely on how effectively you learn to manage the game's two ultimate adversaries: the course and yourself.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.
author: Al Bernstein

quote: Success is sweet and sweeter if long delayed and gotten through many struggles and defeats.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: One secret of success in life is for a man to be ready for his opportunity when it comes.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I have learned that success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has had to overcome while trying to succeed.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: There is only one success - to be able to spend your life in your own way.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Much effort, much prosperity.
author: Euripides

quote: There is no substitute for victory.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Most people give up just when they're about to achieve success. They quit on the one yard line. They give up at the last minute of the game one foot from a winning touchdown.
author: Ross Perot

quote: Belief in oneself is one of the most important bricks in building any successful venture.
author: Lydia M. Child

quote: People think that at the top there isn't much room. They tend to think of it as an Everest. My message is that there is tons of room at the top.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: They succeed, because they think they can.
author: Virgil

quote: Success is finding satisfaction in giving a little more than you take.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: The secret of my success is a two word answer: Know people.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: Success breeds success.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: God lets you be successful because he trusts you that you will do the right thing with it. Now, does he get disappointed often? All the time, because people get there and they forget how they got it.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: Actually, I'm an overnight success, but it took twenty years.
author: Monty Hall

quote: When you're working hard and doing all you can to achieve your goals, anything that can give you an edge is powerful and will streamline your path to success.
author: Travis Bradberry

quote: After a lifetime of working, raising families, and contributing to the success of this nation in countless other ways, senior citizens deserve to retire with dignity.
author: Charlie Gonzalez

quote: Anything that won't sell, I don't want to invent. Its sale is proof of utility, and utility is success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: For true success ask yourself these four questions: Why? Why not? Why not me? Why not now?
author: James Allen

quote: Success is not only one thing. It's not only having a nice house in Beverly Hills and driving a nice Mercedes.
author: Malik Bendjelloul

quote: Time is the most precious element of human existence. The successful person knows how to put energy into time and how to draw success from time.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Carry on any enterprise as if all future success depended on it.
author: Cardinal Richelieu

quote: If a man has been his mother's undisputed darling he retains throughout life the triumphant feeling, the confidence in success, which not seldom brings actual success along with it.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: There's more to life than success, and if you can try to be more well-rounded, you'll be able to enjoy your success more. It won't own you or control you.
author: Ricky Williams

quote: Real success is being totally indulgent about your own trip. You put your blinders on about the garbage and go full speed ahead.
author: Betsey Johnson

quote: I never expected any sort of success with 'Mockingbird'... I sort of hoped someone would like it enough to give me encouragement.
author: Harper Lee

quote: To have success in your professional life is not so hard. To succeed as a man is more difficult.
author: Yann Arthus-Bertrand

quote: The hardest thing to find in life is balance - especially, the more success you have, the more you look to the other side of the gate.
author: Celine Dion

quote: Some say I'm an overnight success. Well, that was a very long night that lasted about 10 years.
author: Lisa Morton

quote: We know from research that growth is actually contagious, so if you want to reach your goals, you've got to get around people that are going in the same direction you want to be going, and you will catch the success.
author: Henry Cloud

quote: The difference between us and them, between you and success, is not that you never fail, but it's how you recover from those failures - is that you keep getting up time and time again. You figure out what you did wrong, and then you make it right. I say that to my kids every day.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: Success is the child of audacity.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Success requires first expending ten units of effort to produce one unit of results. Your momentum will then produce ten units of results with each unit of effort.
author: Charles J. Givens

quote: Success consists in being successful, not in having potential for success. Any wide piece of ground is the potential site of a palace, but there's no palace till it's built.
author: Fernando Pessoa

quote: A long apprenticeship is the most logical way to success. The only alternative is overnight stardom, but I can't give you a formula for that.
author: Chet Atkins

quote: The success of any great moral enterprise does not depend upon numbers.
author: William Lloyd Garrison

quote: When I meet with the founders of a new company, my advice is almost always, 'Do fewer things.' It's true of partnerships, marketing opportunities, anything that's taking up your time. The vast majority of things are distractions, and very few really matter to your success.
author: Evan Williams

quote: Fame or perceived success - it all comes from groupthink.
author: Chance The Rapper

quote: The success of the young entrepreneur will be the key to India's transformation in the new millennium.
author: Dhirubhai Ambani

quote: I tried out various experiments described in treatises on physics and chemistry, and the results were sometimes unexpected. At times, I would be encouraged by a little unhoped-for success; at others, I would be in the deepest despair because of accidents and failures resulting from my inexperience.
author: Marie Curie

quote: Only stupid people are changed by success.
author: Jurgen Klopp

quote: We don't have a divine right to success. So I agree with a lot of politicians out there when they say, 'We've got serious issues.' We do: immigration, infrastructure. I think income inequality's one of them.
author: Jamie Dimon

quote: You know you've reached true success the day you become truly humble. That's the day you stop needing to prove to the world - and yourself - that you've accomplished something meaningful.
author: Naveen Jain

quote: Success? You can't get a big head about it. When people stare at me, they could be whispering to their friend, 'That guy sucks! Have you seen him before? He's horrible.'
author: David Spade

quote: In most things success depends on knowing how long it takes to succeed.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: Real success is finding you lifework in the work that you love.
author: David McCullough

quote: The most absurd and reckless aspirations have sometimes led to extraordinary success.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Applause waits on success.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success has always been easy to measure. It is the distance between one's origins and one's final achievement.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Success is full of promise till one gets it, and then it seems like a nest from which the bird has flown.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The more defects a man may have, the older he is, the less lovable, the more resounding his success.
author: Marquis de Sade

quote: Success is about enjoying what you have and where you are, while pursuing achievable goals.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: I have found no greater satisfaction than achieving success through honest dealing and strict adherence to the view that, for you to gain, those you deal with should gain as well.
author: Alan Greenspan

quote: The first and most important step toward success is the feeling that we can succeed.
author: Nelson Boswell

quote: We just want to win. That's the bottom line. I think a lot of times people may become content with one championship or a little bit of success, but we don't really reflect on what we've done in the past. We focus on the present.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: I don't know what keeps me going. Sometimes I wonder... I think it's just pure perseverance and wanting to succeed and having that burning desire to always have success.
author: Tanya Tucker

quote: Academic success depends on research and publications.
author: Philip Zimbardo

quote: How does one measure the success of a museum?
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: To burn always with this hard, gem-like flame, to maintain this ecstasy, is success in life.
author: Walter Pater

quote: It takes 20 years to make an overnight success.
author: Eddie Cantor

quote: The development of our human resources is an area in which we need to do well as it is decisive in determining the success of our diversification programme.
author: Hassanal Bolkiah

quote: I congratulate you, my brave countrymen and fellow soldiers, on the spirit and success with which you have executed this important part of our enterprise.
author: James Wolfe

quote: Our success educationally, industrially and politically is based upon the protection of a nation founded by ourselves. And the nation can be nowhere else but in Africa.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Success is dependent upon the glands - sweat glands.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Raising children is an uncertain thing success is reached only after a life of battle and worry.
author: Democritus

quote: Never mind what others do; do better than yourself, beat your own record from day to day, and you are a success.
author: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: Success depends in a very large measure upon individual initiative and exertion, and cannot be achieved except by a dint of hard work.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: We're constantly striving for success, fame and comfort when all we really need to be happy is someone or some thing to be enthusiastic about.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: One man cannot practice many arts with success.
author: Plato

quote: I remember one day sitting at the pool and suddenly the tears were streaming down my cheeks. Why was I so unhappy? I had success. I had security. But it wasn't enough. I was exploding inside.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: Success is dangerous. One begins to copy oneself, and to copy oneself is more dangerous than to copy others. It leads to sterility.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: What I have in common with the character in 'Truman' is this incredible need to please people. I feel like I want to take care of everyone and I also feel this terrible guilt if I am unable to. And I have felt this way ever since all this success started.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: You look at the tremendous success of Facebook. To my mind there is not a lot of commerce going on in these social networking sites. eBay is a community anchored in commerce. It is a commerce site that built a community around it. What has not been proven is if the reverse can happen and people will go to community sites to do commerce.
author: Meg Whitman

quote: We are constantly emphasizing to people that they need to address anything that affects flight safety or mission success - many pathways to do that. We need to understand better what may be preventing people from using those pathways.
author: Ellen Ochoa

quote: When people stand up and talk about the great success that the EU has been, I'm not sure anybody saying it really believes it themselves anymore.
author: Nigel Farage

quote: In hindsight, I slid into arrogance based upon past success.
author: Reed Hastings

quote: In inner-city, low-income communities of color, there's such a high correlation in terms of educational quality and success.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Success is the American Dream. And that success is not something to be ashamed of, or to demonize.
author: Susana Martinez

quote: I think it's way harder when you have success, 'cause people tend to not treat you the same or look at you the same because they see the success or the money you make.
author: Meek Mill

quote: Lord knows, every day is not a success, every year is not a success. You have to celebrate the good.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: No skill shapes a child's future success in school or in life more than the ability to read.
author: Bob Riley

quote: I sort of understood that when I first started: that you shouldn't repeat a success. Very often you're going to, and maybe the first time you do, it works. And you love it. But then you're trapped.
author: Jack Nicholson

quote: People are beginning to see that the first requisite to success in life is to be a good animal.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: Within the hearts men, loyalty and consideration are esteemed greater than success.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: In the United States, I am a great success, but I am not a celebrity.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: When you win, nothing hurts.
author: Joe Namath

quote: To do a common thing uncommonly well brings success.
author: Henry J. Heinz

quote: What is success? It is a toy balloon among children armed with pins.
author: Gene Fowler

quote: Everything you need for better future and success has already been written. And guess what? All you have to do is go to the library.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Don't confuse fame with success. Madonna is one Helen Keller is the other.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.
author: Danny Thomas

quote: Real success is not, like, materialistic. It's being where you want to be when you want to be; just living your life how you feel; having an ultimate goal and being able to accomplish it.
author: Lindsey Wixson

quote: I find my greatest pleasure, and so my reward, in the work that precedes what the world calls success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I came to America with a dream and I made it. The dream became reality. America is built for success.
author: Jean-Claude Van Damme

quote: I want to see success right away. And I want to never give up, never stop.
author: Joe Nichols

quote: I suppose your security is your success and your key to success is your fine palate.
author: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Success in training the boy depends largely on the Scoutmaster's own personal example.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Success is a process, a quality of mind and way of being, an outgoing affirmation of life.
author: Alex Noble

quote: In actuality, California could be a wonderful place to live. In fact, if you're highly educated and ambitious, you can do quite well here while enjoying the sun and the fun. The only problem: California will then blame you for your success and recommend that all your cash be removed from you.
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: My parents are very proud of my success but still worry, as I'm in a profession where there is no guarantee of work. They have always supported my decision to go into acting, but there have been tough times work-wise.
author: David Harewood

quote: Remember you will not always win. Some days, the most resourceful individual will taste defeat. But there is, in this case, always tomorrow - after you have done your best to achieve success today.
author: Maxwell Maltz

quote: Feeling anxious or depressed sometimes is part of what it means to be a person, and it might even be essential to success.
author: K. Flay

quote: We've stayed really normal and down to Earth I think, and haven't let the success thing go to our head.
author: Ashley Olsen

quote: A critical factor in its success was that the X developers were willing to give the sources away for free in accordance with the hacker ethic, and able to distribute them over the Internet.
author: Eric S. Raymond

quote: Success is tricky to deal with, both professionally and in your personal life.
author: Ewan McGregor

quote: People are the key to success or extraordinary success.
author: Azim Premji

quote: Success demands singleness of purpose.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If I had permitted my failures, or what seemed to me at the time a lack of success, to discourage me I cannot see any way in which I would ever have made progress.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: He has achieved success who has worked well, laughed often, and loved much.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I never assumed I would have that commercial success, so it was a total surprise. And honestly, I never assumed that it would ever happen again.
author: Tracy Chapman

quote: I don't dwell on success. Maybe that's one reason I'm successful.
author: Calvin Klein

quote: Our success as a global brand has been directly related to how we select locations where we are confident our particular clients desire to be. Los Cabos, Mexico is the ideal Engel & Volkers market, growing in popularity among world luxury travelers seeking exceptional properties for second home opportunities.
author: Anthony Hitt

quote: Past success is no guarantee of future success, so I have learned to be an entrepreneur. I began to produce and direct my own projects.
author: Ian Ziering

quote: Teachers are always trying to inspire people to do better, to learn, to grow. That's what we do, and we're proud of the success we've had here doing that, and it's something we'll certainly continue to do.
author: Nick Saban

quote: Be yourself. Follow your instincts. Success depends, at least in part, on the ability to 'carry it off.'
author: Donald Rumsfeld

quote: My definition of success is to live your life in a way that causes you to feel a ton of pleasure and very little pain - and because of your lifestyle, have the people around you feel a lot more pleasure than they do pain.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: When it comes to success, there are no shortcuts.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Fourth Law of Thermodynamics: If the probability of success is not almost one, then it is damn near zero.
author: David R. Ellis

quote: My definition of success is control.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: Success is the progressive realization of predetermined, worthwhile, personal goals.
author: Paul J. Meyer

quote: People seldom see the halting and painful steps by which the most insignificant success is achieved.
author: Anne Sullivan

quote: You do not pay the price of success, you enjoy the price of success.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: There is no scientific answer for success. You can't define it. You've simply got to live it and do it.
author: Anita Roddick

quote: The victor belongs to the spoils.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Those who have succeeded at anything and don't mention luck are kidding themselves.
author: Larry King

quote: For an actress to be a success, she must have the face of a Venus, the brains of a Minerva, the grace of Terpsichore, the memory of a MaCaulay, the figure of Juno, and the hide of a rhinoceros.
author: Ethel Barrymore

quote: Honesty is the cornerstone of all success, without which confidence and ability to perform shall cease to exist.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: One of the rewards of success is freedom, the ability to do whatever you like.
author: Sting

quote: We reached a high point in my opinion with the passage of the civil rights legislation and Martin Luther King's success and the crusade of others. I think we kind of breathed a sigh of relief as if we had achieved the end of racial discrimination or white supremacy.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: Perseverance - a lowly virtue whereby mediocrity achieves an inglorious success.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The successful man doesn't use others, other people use the successful man, for above all the success is of service.
author: Mark Caine

quote: Wal-Mart's success strategies and tactics are easy to understand yet hard to duplicate.
author: Michael Bergdahl

quote: Success is the most important to many, to me it's just a bonus.
author: Lucas Grabeel

quote: There's no one particular road that will lead you to success. I think everybody will find it differently.
author: Marina and the Diamonds

quote: Stem cell research holds enormous promise for easing human suffering, and federal support is critical to its success.
author: Tom Harkin

quote: With the success of a show, you get an opportunity to call attention to things that you believe in.
author: Bradley Whitford

quote: In the United States there's a Puritan ethic and a mythology of success. He who is successful is good. In Latin countries, in Catholic countries, a successful person is a sinner.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: The real end winner of NAFTA is going to be Mexico because we have the human capital. We have that resource that is vital to the success of the U.S. economy.
author: Vicente Fox

quote: Obedience brings success exact obedience brings miracles.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: To be successful you have to be lucky, or a little mad, or very talented, or find yourself in a rapid growth field.
author: Edward de Bono

quote: Real success is not on the stage, but off the stage as a human being, and how you get along with your fellow man.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Success follows those adept at preserving the substance of the past by clothing it in the forms of the future.
author: Dee Hock

quote: The hardest thing to find in life is balance - especially the more success you have, the more you look to the other side of the gate. What do I need to stay grounded, in touch, in love, connected, emotionally balanced? Look within yourself.
author: Celine Dion

quote: My goal in coming to General Motors was to help restore profitability, build a strong market position and position this iconic company for success. We are clearly on that path.
author: Edward Whitacre, Jr.

quote: Nothing recedes like success.
author: Walter Winchell

quote: Success can make you go one of two ways. It can make you a prima donna - or it can smooth the edges, take away the insecurities, let the nice things come out.
author: Barbara Walters

quote: Every person who wins in any undertaking must be willing to cut all sources of retreat. Only by doing so can one be sure of maintaining that state of mind known as a burning desire to win - essential to success.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Therefore, if one were to consider that there was virtually no possibility of success through the US-Japan negotiations, the military and economic pressures would only force Japan into further crisis if time were allowed to pass in vain.
author: Hideki Tojo

quote: People of mediocre ability sometimes achieve outstanding success because they don't know when to quit. Most men succeed because they are determined to.
author: George Allen, Sr.

quote: Post-operatively the transplanted kidney functioned immediately with a dramatic improvement in the patient's renal and cardiopulmonary status. This spectacular success was a clear demonstration that organ transplantation could be life-saving.
author: Joseph Murray

quote: There is just a lot of creativity and theatricality in performers who happen to be gay. Maybe there's a success in numbers, so by the law of averages we are going to get these jobs.
author: Neil Patrick Harris

quote: The future of America is not an entitlement. We have been given a treasure chest of gifts and opportunities, but some people are being left behind, and success is not sustainable unless it is shared.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: Things that look like an 'overnight success' typically are not.
author: Jason Calacanis

quote: Even successful musicians have had periods where people say they suck and no one likes them, even after they've had periods of great success. So I think it's like you just gotta do you and try to stay motivated. Until, you know, you decide to stay home and make spaghetti all day.
author: K. Flay

quote: The talent of success is nothing more than doing what you can do well, and doing well whatever you do without thought of fame. If it comes at all it will come because it is deserved, not because it is sought after.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Personal satisfaction is the most important ingredient of success.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Forward, as occasion offers. Never look round to see whether any shall note it... Be satisfied with success in even the smallest matter, and think that even such a result is no trifle.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: There's no secret about success. Did you ever know a successful man who didn't tell you about it?
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Success is not greedy, as people think, but insignificant. That is why it satisfies nobody.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: You know you are on the road to success if you would do your job, and not be paid for it.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If I could offer but one helpful hint to young Hoosiers hoping to better their odds for success in life, I would simply note the importance of thoughtful reading.
author: Richard Lugar

quote: Successful people breed success.
author: Phil Crosby

quote: The essential element of successful strategy is that it derives its success from the differences between competitors with a consequent difference in their behavior.
author: Bruce Henderson

quote: We help people to begin truly healthful diets, and it is absolutely wonderful to see, not only their success, but also their delight at their ability to break old habits and feel really healthy for a change.
author: Neal Barnard

quote: Success is just being happy. And I try so many different things. I do a lot of different things. Because I think God has helped me to love myself. I know who God is, and I love God.
author: Herschel Walker

quote: Success listens only to applause. To all else it is deaf.
author: Elias Canetti

quote: Honesty is the most single most important factor having a direct bearing on the final success of an individual, corporation, or product.
author: Ed McMahon

quote: I would like to wish the England squad every success. I would also very much like to extend those wishes to Martin Johnson, Brian Smith, Mike Ford, John Wells, Graham Rowntree and the rest of the England 2011 World Cup management team who have been fantastic and deserve people to know that.
author: Jonny Wilkinson

quote: I know that when I like music, when it touches my heart, that it will touch your heart, too. That, I think, is the secret to my success.
author: Andre Rieu

quote: If you create incredible value and information for others that can change their lives - and you always stay focused on that service - the financial success will follow.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: I must admit that I personally measure success in terms of the contributions an individual makes to her or his fellow human beings.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: The only yardstick for success our society has is being a champion. No one remembers anything else.
author: John Madden

quote: I define success as being comfortable with yourself and your life. And that is about as good as it gets, really.
author: Treat Williams

quote: I think you can have moderate success by copying something else, but if you really want to knock it out of the park, you have to do something different and take chances.
author: Lee Ann Womack

quote: I am stable when my private life is a success.
author: Don Johnson
category: Life, I Am, Life Is A

quote: Possessed with a full confidence of the certain success which British valor must gain over such enemies, I have led you up these steep and dangerous rocks, only solicitous to show you the foe within your reach.
author: James Wolfe

quote: Success is a great deodorant.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: Nothing is as seductive as the assurance of success.
author: Gertrude Himmelfarb

quote: I think the biggest challenge is to continue on the same path. I think it's easy to become complacent from the success you've had.
author: Jason Derulo

quote: Other people's success spurs me on to do well and gives me motivation.
author: Nicholas Hoult

quote: In order to succeed you must fail, so that you know what not to do the next time.
author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quote: Pray that success will not come any faster than you are able to endure it.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success.
author: Irving Berlin

quote: The measure of success is not whether you have a tough problem to deal with, but whether it is the same problem you had last year.
author: John Foster Dulles

quote: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: One needs more than ambition and talent to make a success of anything, really. There must be love and a vocation.
author: Jessye Norman

quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: In order that people may be happy in their work, these three things are needed: They must be fit for it. They must not do too much of it. And they must have a sense of success in it.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Why be a man when you can be a success?
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: Success is the sweetest revenge.
author: Vanessa Williams

quote: Despite the success cult, men are most deeply moved not by the reaching of the goal but by the grandness of the effort involved in getting there - or failing to get there.
author: Max Lerner

quote: Failures to heroic minds are the stepping stones to success.
author: Thomas Chandler Haliburton

quote: Achieve success in any area of life by identifying the optimum strategies and repeating them until they become habits.
author: Charles J. Givens

quote: Success consecrates the most offensive crimes.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Desire is the most important factor in the success of any athlete.
author: Bill Shoemaker

quote: Luxury is the wolf at the door and its fangs are the vanities and conceits germinated by success. When an artist learns this, he knows where the danger is.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Whether a party can have much success without a woman present I must ask others to decide, but one thing is certain, no party is any fun unless seasoned with folly.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Success didn't spoil me, I've always been insufferable.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Success is following the pattern of life one enjoys most.
author: Al Capp

quote: The only question to ask yourself is, how much are you willing to sacrifice to achieve this success?
author: Larry Flynt

quote: There are a lot of things that go into creating success. I don't like to do just the things I like to do. I like to do things that cause the company to succeed. I don't spend a lot of time doing my favorite activities.
author: Michael Dell

quote: What material success does is provide you with the ability to concentrate on other things that really matter. And that is being able to make a difference, not only in your own life, but in other people's lives.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Whatever success I've had, I always like to top it.
author: Bernie Mac

quote: Nobody travels on the road to success without a puncture or two.
author: Navjot Singh Sidhu

quote: Success is always temporary. When all is said and one, the only thing you'll have left is your character.
author: Vince Gill

quote: Success is not in never failing, but rising everytime you fall!
author: Jonathan Taylor Thomas

quote: Four years of football are calculated to breed in the average man more of the ingredients of success in life than almost any academic course he takes.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: To these ideals which were instilled in me when I was a youth, I attribute in a large degree the success that was mine on the bicycle tracks of the world.
author: Major Taylor

quote: All of us are born for a reason, but all of us don't discover why. Success in life has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others.
author: Danny Thomas

quote: Currently, only 70 percent of our high school students earn diplomas with their peers, and less than one-third of our high school students graduate prepared for success in a four-year college.
author: Ruben Hinojosa

quote: The success of each of us benefits us all, and the success of us all benefits each of us individually.
author: Walter Ulbricht

quote: I believe success is preparation, because opportunity is going to knock on your door sooner or later but are you prepared to answer that?
author: Omar Epps

quote: I attribute my success to my mental approach to the game. I have always been a serious student of umpiring. I enjoy studying rules, situations, and positioning.
author: Jim Evans

quote: Well, you would have to say what is the criteria to determine the success of any merger? It would have to be that the companies are stronger financially, that they took market share, and they are on a very steady footing in terms of their performance.
author: Kevin Rollins

quote: Every success in limiting armaments is a sign that the will to achieve mutual understanding exists, and every such success thus supports the fight for international law and order.
author: Ludwig Quidde

quote: I worked half my life to be an overnight success, and still it took me by surprise.
author: Jessica Savitch

quote: Telecom is a dramatic success in India and our view is, respecting the political process, and respecting the fact that these are sovereign decisions, is that, approaching India as a friend.
author: John W. Snow

quote: Evolution acts slowly. Our psychological characteristics today are those that promoted reproductive success in the ancestral environment.
author: Keith Henson

quote: Happy people are ignoramuses and glory is nothing else but success, and to achieve it one only has to be cunning.
author: Mikhail Lermontov

quote: The secret of my success is my hairspray.
author: Richard Gere

quote: Greatness is so often a courteous synonym for great success.
author: Philip Guedalla

quote: Think of yourself as on the threshold of unparalleled success. A whole, clear, glorious life lies before you. Achieve! Achieve!
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: Sudden success in golf is like the sudden acquisition of wealth. It is apt to unsettle and deteriorate the character.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: To follow, without halt, one aim: that's the secret of success.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: Thought is the original source of all wealth, all success, all material gain, all great discoveries and inventions, and of all achievement.
author: Claude M. Bristol

quote: Temporary success can be achieved in spite of lack of other fundamental qualities, but no advancements can be maintained without hard work.
author: William Feather

quote: Success makes men rigid and they tend to exalt stability over all the other virtues tired of the effort of willing they become fanatics about conservatism.
author: Walter Lippmann

quote: Success is a consequence and must not be a goal.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: We're not afraid of risking what was our success yesterday in order to explore some new field. We're adventurous. We like the challenge of unknown territory, unknown artistic field, and that's what stimulates us.
author: Guy Laliberte

quote: My proudest achievement has been the success of the shows and artists I have been involved with, because they were made in Britain.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: Success isn't always going to be a huge contract success is going to be if you just live out your purpose in life.
author: Allan Houston

quote: Awards are not the only markers of success I don't judge myself just based on them. I believe that each cinema-goer has his own mental trophies.
author: Fan Bingbing

quote: Well I think any author or musician is anxious to have legitimate sales of their products, partly so they're rewarded for their success, partly so they can go on and do new things.
author: Bill Gates

quote: The person who makes a success of living is the one who sees his goal steadily and aims for it unswervingly.
author: Cecil B. DeMille

quote: I have more love, success, and security than I could ever dream of.
author: George Michael

quote: Money does not guarantee success.
author: Jose Mourinho

quote: I'm not a defender of old or new football managers. I believe in good ones and bad ones, those that achieve success and those that don't.
author: Jose Mourinho

quote: It's the price of success: people start to think you're omnipotent.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: We do not celebrate people who have made success out of serious hard work.
author: Iain Duncan Smith

quote: Hopefully I'll continue to have the success I've had.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: Well, certainly one of the ironies of the success of affirmative action is that the middle class within the black community no longer lives within 'black community' by and large.
author: Henry Louis Gates

quote: The historical basis for the gap between the black middle class and underclass shows that ending discrimination, by itself, would not eradicate black poverty and dysfunction. We also need intervention to promulgate a middle-class ethic of success among the poor, while expanding opportunities for economic betterment.
author: Henry Louis Gates

quote: It's not just the 'Grammys' that I've pulled out of. I also pulled out of the English awards as well. The reason that I wanted to pull out was because I believe very much that the music industry as a whole is mainly concerned with material success.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: The one thing that makes me feel super lucky about my financial success is that I have a housekeeper.
author: Gwen Stefani

quote: Commercial success still hasn't come to an artist that isn't signed to a record label. There are very few artists that can succeed without the help of a record label. The role of the record label is still required, it's still necessary.
author: Edgar Bronfman, Jr.

quote: Young people need the hands-on training that comes with a summer job. They need to know how to dress for success and nail job interviews. But most of all, they need mentorship, guidance, and inspiration.
author: Hilda Solis

quote: My career started young and I was really ambitious, and then I had success and I hung out with people who were much older. I think I might have been temporally misplaced, so I thought I was 40. It was a premature midlife crisis.
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: So I feel like success is opportunity plus preparation, so work begets work, and as long as you're prepared it's going to continue to come your way.
author: Anthony Mackie

quote: I think that when we have a better educated society, when there is less violence in our cities, when people get back into the workforce and have the opportunity to take care of themselves and their families - that for me really is the kind of success and the kind of America that I think most of us still want, we aspire to.
author: Michael Nutter

quote: Entrepreneurs can't forecast accurately, because they are trying something fundamentally new. So they will often be laughably behind plan - and on the brink of success.
author: Eric Ries

quote: We crave instant success these days. If you are a really good sprinter and long jumper, you don't want to spend two or three years on a whole new set of events. You're used to doing well and it's difficult to give that up.
author: Daley Thompson

quote: Our worldly successes cannot be guaranteed, but our ability to achieve spiritual success is entirely up to us, thanks to the grace of God. The best advice I know is to give is to give those worldly things your best but never your all - reserve the ultimate hope for the only one who can grant it.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: A constant struggle, a ceaseless battle to bring success from inhospitable surroundings, is the price of all great achievements.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Super-ambitious goals tend to be unifying and energizing to people but only if they believe there's a chance of success.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: Success is the one unpardonable sin against our fellows.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Your success story is a bigger story than whatever you're trying to say on stage. Success makes life easier. It doesn't make living easier.
author: Bruce Springsteen

quote: In this world it is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: If you want to achieve things in life, you've just got to do them, and if you're talented and smart, you'll succeed.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: Not every difficult and dangerous thing is suitable for training, but only that which is conducive to success in achieving the object of our effort.
author: Epictetus

quote: I am highly offended by the total lack of acknowledgement of my contribution to Laker success.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I have no time for those who say there is no way Scotland could go it alone. I know first-hand the contribution Scotland and Scots make to Britain's success - so for me there's no question about whether Scotland could be an independent nation.
author: David Cameron

quote: Success to me is having ten honeydew melons and eating only the top half of each slice.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: The common idea that success spoils people by making them vain, egotistic and self-complacent is erroneous; on the contrary it makes them, for the most part, humble, tolerant and kind.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Success is survival.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: A great secret of success is to go through life as a man who never gets used up.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: I feel like I want to take care of everyone and I also feel this terrible guilt if I am unable to. And I have felt this way ever since all this success started.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: A lot of people don't have near the amount of success as I've been blessed to have, and it's all about working hard and hoping that continues.
author: Luke Bryan

quote: As an actor there's a lot of scrutiny and, even when you've had success, it becomes about sustaining that success. A friend of mine described it as a peakless mountain. Even for De Niro there's Pacino and for Pacino there's De Niro.
author: Eddie Redmayne

quote: I'm extremely ambitious. I don't know why people are afraid to say that. I won't sell my soul to the devil, but I do want success and I don't think that's bad.
author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quote: I feel lucky because I was a nerd, which I talk about in the book, but I had academic success, so through that, because that's what my parents put a great deal of value on, I had a great childhood because I sort of fulfilled the expectations of being good at school.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: I saw a lot of people have success handed to them that then exploited it. They didn't protect it or cherish it.
author: Aaron Paul

quote: Our success in Singapore was a Herculean effort by the whole team. Now I am determined to deliver on all we promised. I will be watching like a hawk.
author: Sebastian Coe

quote: From success you get a lot of things, but not that great inside thing that love brings you.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: Success in the majority of circumstances depends on knowing how long it takes to succeed.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: At Princeton I gained a great deal of pleasure from success in my classes. knowing that I could accomplish those things, and I realized that my success was directly proportionate to the work I put in.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: Nothing succeeds like the appearance of success.
author: Christopher Lasch

quote: Sometimes I worry about being a success in a mediocre world.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: The manic pursuit of success cost me everything I could love: my wife, my three children, some friends I would have liked to grow old with.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Writers, as they gain success, feel like outsiders because writers don't come together in real groups.
author: Anne Rice

quote: All men's gains are the fruit of venturing.
author: Herodotus

quote: I always envisioned myself being a rapper and being in the game and having success, but you never know what it feels like or how you're going to be when you're there.
author: Wiz Khalifa

quote: How can they say my life is not a success? Have I not for more than sixty years got enough to eat and escaped being eaten?
author: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: It's our nature: Human beings like success but they hate successful people.
author: Carrot Top

quote: When it comes to social consequences, they've got all different people acting in different ways, very difficult to even have a proper criterion of success. So, it's a difficult task.
author: George Soros

quote: Success in any endeavor depends on the degree to which it is an expression of your true self.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Whatever success I may have attained is due to the fact that since I was old enough to work at all, my ambition has never deserted me.
author: Anna Held

quote: I would love to be a guest on a talk show or a panel that shows women who have been on reality shows who've had success, to prove to audiences that you don't have to be a fool to become successful.
author: NeNe Leakes

quote: You take all the things that frighten you, and when you can get them to work for you all of sudden people are calling you a success.
author: Randy Bachman

quote: If you can figure out my success on the screen, you're a better man than I.
author: Alan Ladd

quote: I'm used to adversity and working really well in difficult situations. It was hard for me to accept the success.
author: Paula Cole

quote: Though I had success in my research both when I was mad and when I was not, eventually I felt that my work would be better respected if I thought and acted like a 'normal' person.
author: John Forbes Nash, Jr.

quote: We fall forward to succeed.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: People fall forward to success.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: I don't think about financial success as the measurement of my success.
author: Christie Hefner

quote: Can you imagine what I would do if I could do all I can?
author: Jeff Rich

quote: Success is the space one occupies in the newspaper. Success is one day's insolence.
author: Elias Canetti

quote: Success doesn't mean that you are healthy, success doesn't mean that you're happy, success doesn't mean that you're rested. Success really doesn't mean that you look good, or feel good, or are good.
author: Victoria Principal

quote: That's the key to success, isn't it? It has to be fun.
author: Monica Seles

quote: I'm still craving approval from my parents. It took a lot of success for me to realize it was never coming. It's just not in their nature.
author: Andrew Stanton

quote: The success and the failure are not my concern, but His.
author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

quote: Choose something you like to do. I know it's a cliche, and you've heard it over and over. But the reason is, you're going to have to work long and hard to achieve any success. You better like it or life is going to be terrible.
author: Bill Kurtis

quote: People say we were an overnight success. It took us a year to be an overnight success.
author: James Daly

quote: You've achieved success in your field when you don't know whether what you're doing is work or play.
author: Warren Beatty

quote: People repeat behaviour that leads to flooding their brains with pleasurable chemicals. The short-term reward loop acts over hours to years, and the long-term reproductive success loop over generations.
author: Keith Henson

quote: Action leads to Attention. that in the short-term releases Rewarding brain chemicals and in the long term improves reproductive success.
author: Keith Henson

quote: I have gone from being a 21-year-old with wide eyes to a 24-year-old woman. With success comes a lot of responsibility and power.
author: Vanessa Carlton

quote: My success is not due to any personal superiority over other people.
author: John Philip Sousa

quote: Every day of my life I walk with the idea that I am black, no matter how successful I am. And our success is tempered by that; you're successful in this way given the fact you are black, and most blacks don't get to that point.
author: Danny Glover

quote: Instead of this confusion, we need the unifying force of an official language, English, which is the language of success in America.
author: Ernest Istook

quote: If people ask me for the ingredients of success, I say one is talent, two is stubbornness or determination, and third is sheer luck. You have to have two out of the three. Any two will probably do.
author: Fred Saberhagen

quote: Success isn't everything but it makes a man stand straight.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: I take great pride in all the tremendous success we've enjoyed at CBS. And the good news is that I feel even more enthusiastic about what my terrific team and I will accomplish going forward.
author: Leslie Moonves

quote: I am decidedly of the opinion that in very many instances we can trace such a necessary connexion, especially among birds, and often with more complete success than in the case which I have here attempted to explain.
author: Alfred Russel Wallace

quote: In a balanced organization, working towards a common objective, there is success.
author: Arthur Helps

quote: But the best teams I've encountered have one important thing in common: their team structure and processes cover a full range of distinct competencies necessary for success.
author: Jesse James Garrett

quote: I want to make sure I don't interfere with the success of that team next year. I don't see any way I could go to practice like most of 'em do, and not hurt the team. I'd go nuts if I tried doing that.
author: Bear Bryant

quote: It's harder to be a success, globally, and be artistic. Harder to have that balance than just to be artistic when nobody understands you.
author: Andre Benjamin

quote: The fame of heroes owes little to the extent of their conquests and all to the success of the tributes paid to them.
author: Jean Genet

quote: Success in almost any field depends more on energy and drive than it does on intelligence. This explains why we have so many stupid leaders.
author: Sloan Wilson

quote: My dad told me, 'It takes fifteen years to be an overnight success', and it took me seventeen and a half years.
author: Adrien Brody

quote: Rockefeller once explained the secret of success. 'Get up early, work late - and strike oil.'
author: Joey Adams

quote: Change can either challenge or threaten us. Your beliefs pave your way to success or block you.
author: Marsha Sinetar

quote: I am very optimistic, and I wish that God almighty grants me success to get a qualifying time. Only then can I go to the Olympics. If this happens I will be the first Palestinian athlete to gain a qualifying time. This will be a big achievement.
author: Nader al-Masri

quote: Integrity is so perishable in the summer months of success.
author: Vanessa Redgrave

quote: Success is not a place at which one arrives but rather the spirit with which one undertakes and continues the journey.
author: Alex Noble

quote: A strong passion for any object will ensure success, for the desire of the end will point out the means.
author: Henry Hazlitt

quote: Success is an absurd, erratic thing. She arrives when one least expects her and after she has come may depart again almost because of a whim.
author: Alice Foote MacDougall

quote: It's not enough that I should succeed - others should fail.
author: David Merrick

quote: Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Poetry is when an emotion has found its thought and the thought has found words.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Painting is silent poetry, and poetry is painting that speaks.
author: Plutarch

quote: Poetry is an echo, asking a shadow to dance.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Poetry is not a turning loose of emotion, but an escape from emotion; it is not the expression of personality, but an escape from personality. But, of course, only those who have personality and emotions know what it means to want to escape from these things.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: A poet is a nightingale, who sits in darkness and sings to cheer its own solitude with sweet sounds.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: As things are, and as fundamentally they must always be, poetry is not a career, but a mug's game. No honest poet can ever feel quite sure of the permanent value of what he has written: He may have wasted his time and messed up his life for nothing.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: There's a certain line between jokes and music and poetry that's a bit blurred in my mind.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: Immature poets imitate mature poets steal.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: You can find poetry in your everyday life, your memory, in what people say on the bus, in the news, or just what's in your heart.
author: Carol Ann Duffy

quote: If your daily life seems poor, do not blame it; blame yourself that you are not poet enough to call forth its riches; for the Creator, there is no poverty.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: From the beginnings of literature, poets and writers have based their narratives on crossing borders, on wandering, on exile, on encounters beyond the familiar. The stranger is an archetype in epic poetry, in novels. The tension between alienation and assimilation has always been a basic theme.
author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quote: When it comes to atoms, language can be used only as in poetry. The poet, too, is not nearly so concerned with describing facts as with creating images.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: Poetry, even when apparently most fantastic, is always a revolt against artifice, a revolt, in a sense, against actuality.
author: James Joyce

quote: Poetry and music are very good friends. Like mommies and daddies and strawberries and cream - they go together.
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: Poetry is the lifeblood of rebellion, revolution, and the raising of consciousness.
author: Alice Walker

quote: I'm a great believer in poetry out of the classroom, in public places, on subways, trains, on cocktail napkins. I'd rather have my poems on the subway than around the seminar table at an MFA program.
author: Billy Collins

quote: Poetry is like a bird, it ignores all frontiers.
author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quote: Writing a book of poetry is like dropping a rose petal down the Grand Canyon and waiting for the echo.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Poetry is the revelation of a feeling that the poet believes to be interior and personal which the reader recognizes as his own.
author: Salvatore Quasimodo

quote: I was reading the dictionary. I thought it was a poem about everything.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Poetry surrounds us everywhere, but putting it on paper is, alas, not so easy as looking at it.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Cotton was a force of nature. There's a poetry to it, hoeing and growing cotton.
author: B. B. King

quote: Daydreaming is one of the key sources of poetry - a poem often starts as a daydream that finds its way into language - and walking seems to bring a different sort of alertness, an associative kind of thinking, a drifting state of mind.
author: Edward Hirsch

quote: Poetry is not a matter of feelings, it is a matter of language. It is language which creates feelings.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: Hip-hop is about the brilliance of pavement poetry.
author: Michael Eric Dyson

quote: If you have so earth-creeping a mind that it cannot lift itself up to look to the sky of poetry... thus much curse I must send you, in the behalf of all poets, that while you live, you live in love, and never get favour for lacking skill of a sonnet; and, when you die, your memory die from the earth for want of an epitaph.
author: Philip Sidney

quote: Poetry should... should strike the reader as a wording of his own highest thoughts, and appear almost a remembrance.
author: John Keats

quote: Poetry is language at its most distilled and most powerful.
author: Rita Dove

quote: We go to poetry, we go to literature in general, to be forwarded within ourselves.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Poetry is the one place where people can speak their original human mind. It is the outlet for people to say in public what is known in private.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: Listen, real poetry doesn't say anything; it just ticks off the possibilities. Opens all doors. You can walk through any one that suits you.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: It may be said that poems are in one way like icebergs: only about a third of their bulk appears above the surface of the page.
author: Howard Nemerov

quote: A poet's work is to name the unnameable, to point at frauds, to take sides, start arguments, shape the world, and stop it going to sleep.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: Poetry is thoughts that breathe, and words that burn.
author: Thomas Gray

quote: Poetry is emotion, passion, love, grief - everything that is human. It is not for zombies by zombies.
author: F. Sionil Jose

quote: America's liberal arts universities have long been safe zones for leftist thinking, protected ivory towers for the pseudo-elite who earn their livings writing papers nobody reads about gender roles in the poetry of Maya Angelou.
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: I gave up on new poetry myself 30 years ago when most of it began to read like coded messages passing between lonely aliens in a hostile world.
author: Russell Baker

quote: Nobody, I think, ought to read poetry, or look at pictures or statues, who cannot find a great deal more in them than the poet or artist has actually expressed. Their highest merit is suggestiveness.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Poetry is the art of substantiating shadows, and of lending existence to nothing.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: I know some people might think it odd - unworthy even - for me to have written a cookbook, but I make no apologies. The U.S. poet laureate Billy Collins thought I had demeaned myself by writing poetry for Hallmark Cards, but I am the people's poet so I write for the people.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: There are still many tribal cultures where poetry and song, there is just one word for them. There are other cultures with literacy where poetry and song are distinguished. But poetry always remembers that it has its origins in music.
author: Edward Hirsch

quote: I have not the slightest pretension to call my verses poetry I write now and then for no other purpose than to relieve depression or to improve my English.
author: Alfred Nobel

quote: Sri Lanka is an island that everyone loves at some level inside themselves. A very special island that travellers, from Sinbad to Marco Polo, dreamed about. A place where the contours of the land itself forms a kind of sinewy poetry.
author: Romesh Gunesekera

quote: If what distinguishes us from other species is speech, then poetry, which is the supreme linguistic operation, is our anthropological - indeed, genetic - goal.
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: I cannot speak for more than an hour exclusively about poetry. At that point, life itself takes over again.
author: Wislawa Szymborska

quote: Spoken word poetry is the art of performance poetry. I tell people it involves creating poetry that doesn't just want to sit on paper, that something about it demands it be heard out loud or witnessed in person.
author: Sarah Kay

quote: Poetry is what we do to break bread with the dead.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: The poets have been mysteriously silent on the subject of cheese.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Who writes poetry imbibes honey from the poisoned lips of life.
author: William Rose Benet

quote: He who draws noble delights from sentiments of poetry is a true poet, though he has never written a line in all his life.
author: George Sand

quote: A poem is never finished, only abandoned.
author: Paul Valery

quote: I have been enlightened. I have fallen into poetry and it has swallowed me up.
author: Keith Haring

quote: The drama is complete poetry. The ode and the epic contain it only in germ; it contains both of them in a state of high development, and epitomizes both.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I consider myself a poet first and a musician second. I live like a poet and I'll die like a poet.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Poetry is the opening and closing of a door, leaving those who look through to guess about what is seen during the moment.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: I have nothing to say, I am saying it, and that is poetry.
author: John Cage

quote: The poet may be used as a barometer, but let us not forget that he is also part of the weather.
author: Lionel Trilling

quote: Breathe-in experience, breathe-out poetry.
author: Muriel Rukeyser

quote: To read a poem is to hear it with our eyes to hear it is to see it with our ears.
author: Octavio Paz

quote: Poetry is a mirror which makes beautiful that which is distorted.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: God is the perfect poet.
author: Robert Browning

quote: One will never again look at a birch tree, after the Robert Frost poem, in exactly the same way.
author: Paul Muldoon

quote: I still read Donne, particularly his love poems.
author: Carol Ann Duffy

quote: As human beings, we are the only organisms that create for the sheer stupid pleasure of doing so. Whether it's laying out a garden, composing a new tune on the piano, writing a bit of poetry, manipulating a digital photo, redecorating a room, or inventing a new chili recipe - we are happiest when we are creating.
author: Gary Hamel

quote: The genesis of a poem for me is usually a cluster of words. The only good metaphor I can think of is a scientific one: dipping a thread into a supersaturated solution to induce crystal formation. I don't think I solve problems in my poetry I think I uncover the problems.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: I've written some poetry I don't understand myself.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Poetry is a sword of lightning, ever unsheathed, which consumes the scabbard that would contain it.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: Drawing is a way of coming upon the connection between things, just like metaphor in poetry reconnects what has become separated.
author: John Berger

quote: Poetry begins where language starts: in the shadows and accidents of one person's life.
author: Eavan Boland

quote: I have been writing poetry for a long time now. I started writing in my school days.
author: Kapil Sibal

quote: The true spirit of delight, the exaltation, the sense of being more than Man, which is the touchstone of the highest excellence, is to be found in mathematics as surely as poetry.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Great poetry is always written by somebody straining to go beyond what he can do.
author: Stephen Spender

quote: Most people read poetry listening for echoes because the echoes are familiar to them. They wade through it the way a boy wades through water, feeling with his toes for the bottom: The echoes are the bottom.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: Poetry should help, not only to refine the language of the time, but to prevent it from changing too rapidly.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: The only thing that can save the world is the reclaiming of the awareness of the world. That's what poetry does.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: Poetry is not an expression of the party line. It's that time of night, lying in bed, thinking what you really think, making the private world public, that's what the poet does.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: We make out of the quarrel with others, rhetoric, but of the quarrel with ourselves, poetry.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: I don't think you get to good writing unless you expose yourself and your feelings. Deep songs don't come from the surface; they come from the deep down. The poetry and the songs that you are suppose to write, I believe are in your heart.
author: Judy Collins

quote: Theater and poetry were what helped people stay alive and want to go on living.
author: Vanessa Redgrave

quote: Poetry involves the mysteries of the irrational perceived through rational words.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: In poetry, you must love the words, the ideas and the images and rhythms with all your capacity to love anything at all.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: That's the way it is with poetry: When it is incomprehensible it seems profound, and when you understand it, it is only ridiculous.
author: Galway Kinnell

quote: Poetry is as precise a thing as geometry.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: I'm sorry, man, but I've got magic. I've got poetry in my fingertips. Most of the time - and this includes naps - I'm an F-18, bro. And I will destroy you in the air. I will deploy my ordinance to the ground.
author: Charlie Sheen

quote: In the language of poetry, where every word is weighed, nothing is usual or normal. Not a single stone and not a single cloud above it. Not a single day and not a single night after it. And above all, not a single existence, not anyone's existence in this world.
author: Wislawa Szymborska

quote: You know, people speak in poetry all the time. They just don't realize it.
author: Sherman Alexie

quote: I don't think I've ever read poetry, ever.
author: Eminem

quote: I have piles of poetry books in the bathroom, on the stairs, everywhere. The only way to write poetry is to read it.
author: Carol Ann Duffy

quote: If you don't mark your successes, the day your ship comes in could be just another day at the office, and there's no poetry in that.
author: Glen Hansard

quote: It is certain that at certain times talent entirely overcomes thought or poetry.
author: John Singer Sargent

quote: If you've ever been to a poetry slam, you know that the highest scoring emotion is self-righteous indignation: how dare you judge me. So in that way, the poem, 'What Teachers Make,' is an absolutely formulaic slam poem designed to allow me to get up on my soap box and say, 'Let me tell you what really makes me angry.'
author: Taylor Mali

quote: When I rap, I get to express myself in a way where putting words together is like poetry, and sometimes it's better to talk in certain expressions than sing, you know? So I love, I love to rhyme when I want to express certain things.
author: Wyclef Jean

quote: I don't think I've ever read poetry, ever. I'm not really book-smart.
author: Eminem

quote: I think it's often assumed that the role of poetry is to comfort, but for me, poetry is the great unsettler. It questions the established order of the mind. It is radical, by which I don't mean that it is either leftwing or rightwing, but that it works at the roots of thinking.
author: Alice Oswald

quote: If poetry and the arts do anything, they can fortify your inner life, your inwardness.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Everybody interprets things differently with their own perception, and I want poetry to pull out of them their own feelings.
author: John Trudell

quote: Poetry, at its best, is the language your soul would speak if you could teach your soul to speak.
author: Jim Harrison

quote: I'm reading a lot of poetry because it's a lot easier to dip in and dip out when you've got 10 minutes to yourself.
author: Hozier

quote: Music has a poetry of its own, and that poetry is called melody.
author: Joshua Logan

quote: People wish to be poets more than they wish to write poetry, and that's a mistake. One should wish to celebrate more than one wishes to be celebrated.
author: Lucille Clifton

quote: If there's no money in poetry, neither is there poetry in money.
author: Robert Graves

quote: I guess I wanted to leave America for awhile. It wasn't that I wanted to become an expatriate, or just never come back, I needed some breathing room. I'd already been translating French poetry, I'd been to Paris once before and liked it very much, and so I just went.
author: Paul Auster

quote: The music just tends to be a vehicle for that poetry.
author: Mark Knopfler

quote: Literature is a state of culture, poetry is a state of grace, before and after culture.
author: Juan Ramon Jimenez

quote: I think the first time I really heard poetry was in the schoolyard. Just the little limericks that kids say when they're jumping rope and playing games. I think that's the first time I heard rhyming words - I don't know if I'd call that the definitive poetry, but that's when I heard rhyming words said and not necessarily sung.
author: Jill Scott

quote: What are the sources of poetry? Love and death and the paradox of love and death. All poetry from the beginning is about Eros and Thanatos. Those are the only subjects. And how Eros and Thanatos interweave.
author: Erica Jong

quote: More modern poetry is written than read.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Poetry at its best can do you a lot of harm.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: Jazz and poetry both involve a structure that may be familiar and to some extent predictable. And then, you try to create as much surprise and spontaneity and feeling and variation while respecting that structure.
author: Robert Pinsky

quote: I was raised on songs of poetry like Simon and Garfunkel and Cat Stevens and Neil Young, etc. I love those old songs probably the most because they hit me so deep down in my core.
author: Jessica Steen

quote: When you write, it's just a much more crystalline, compressed version of the voice you think with - though not the one you speak with. I think your writing voice is your laser-guided missile. It's the poetry part of you.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: Maya Angelou was the voice of three generations. Her poetry spanned our journey, chronicled our hearts and documented our struggles as we moved from the orations of Martin Luther King to the presidency of Barack Obama.
author: Donna Brazile

quote: Poetry is the universal language which the heart holds with nature and itself. He who has a contempt for poetry, cannot have much respect for himself, or for anything else.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: In the television age, the key distinction is between the candidate who can speak poetry and the one who can only speak prose.
author: Richard M. Nixon

quote: I recently read that it's the left brain that does all that calculating, and the right brain that does the poetry. Somehow I've veered way towards the left. I've been doing it for years. Maybe I do art to balance it out.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: When I was 18, I took a trip to Thailand with a friend. We stayed for a month. Bangkok was very raw for a teenager: there were no cellphones, no Internet, and the only music I had with me was this cassette by Liz Phair. I was writing a lot of poetry, and she embodied a talky style of songwriting that I found very accessible.
author: Jenny Lewis

quote: In a way, Anglo-Saxon poetry cannot be translated.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: No poetry that I'm aware of, however bad or glorious, has ever left somebody a worse person than they were before they read it.
author: Felix Dennis

quote: What my character is or how many jails I have lounged in, or wards or walls or wassails, how many lonely-heart poetry readings I have dodged, is beside the point. A man's soul or lack of it will be evident with what he can carve upon a white sheet of paper.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: If the object of poetry is, to make men, then poetry is the heir of prophecy.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Living here on Earth, we breathe the rhythms of a universe that extends infinitely above us. When resonant harmonies arise between this vast outer cosmos and the inner human cosmos, poetry is born.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: But I liked Yeats! That wild Irishman. I really loved his love of language, his flow. His chaotic ideas seemed to me just the right thing for a poet. Passion! He was always on the right side. He may be wrongheaded, but his heart was always on the right side. He wrote beautiful poetry.
author: Chinua Achebe

quote: Alchemy is the art of far and near, and I think poetry is alchemy in that way. It's delightful to distort size, to see something that's tiny as though it were vast.
author: Robert Morgan

quote: Poetry is not only a set of words which are chosen to relate to each other it is something which goes much further than that to provide a glimpse of our vision of the world.
author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quote: Shakespeare was a man who wrote poetry. I'm a man who writes poetry. Why not compare yourself to the best?
author: Jay-Z

quote: Poetry fettered, fetters the human race. Nations are destroyed or flourish in proportion as their poetry, painting, and music are destroyed or flourish.
author: William Blake

quote: It is time to get drunk! So as not to be the martyred slaves of Time, get drunk; get drunk without stopping! On wine, on poetry, or on virtue, as you wish.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: I've written poetry since I was in the first grade, and it wasn't until I was a little bit older that I realized poetry could be put to music and become a song.
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: I am two fools, I know, for loving, and for saying so in whining poetry.
author: John Donne

quote: I saw the gooseflesh on my skin. I did not know what made it. I was not cold. Had a ghost passed over? No, it was the poetry.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: How can any one paint who cannot grade colors? How can any one write poetry who has not learnt to hear and see?
author: Maria Montessori

quote: Naming a baby is an act of poetry, for many people the only creative moment of their lives.
author: Richard Eyre

quote: All slang is metaphor, and all metaphor is poetry.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
